title: Object - Stock Transfer Transaction
description: Object describing a transfer or secondary sale of a stock security

vesting_condition_id.description: Reference to the `id` of a VestingCondition in this security's VestingTerms. This condition should have a trigger type of `VESTING_START_DATE`.
